## goup-util utm pull

Pull a file from the VM to local machine

### Synopsis

Pull a file from the VM to local machine.

Examples:
  # Pull MSIX from VM
  goup-util utm pull "Windows 11" "C:\\Users\\User\\goup-util\\examples\\hybrid-dashboard\\.bin\\hybrid-dashboard.msix" ./artifacts/

  # Pull build log
  goup-util utm pull "Windows 11" "/tmp/build.log" ./logs/

```
goup-util utm pull <vm-name> <remote-path> <local-path> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for pull
```
